channel.title: Carlos Reygadas on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Carlos Reygadas on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Locarno Film Festival Adds Carlos Reygadas, Joslyn Barnes to Rithy Panh-Led Main Jury
item.description: Indonesian actress Asmara Abigail, TV cinematographer James Hawkinson, and indie writer, director, and producer Michael Almereyda are also among the members of the various juries at the Swiss festival
